songs.title: Zamana Jali (Bohemia)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
Here we go!

[Hook 1]
Ajj kal zamana jali, zamana jali, ajj kal zamana jali (x4)
Ajj kal de log jali, (zamana jali)
Matam de sog jali (zamana jali)
Ajj kal umeed jali, (zamana jali)
Ajj kal di preet jali (zamana jali)

[Verse: 1]
Par, asli ajey vi main
Ve jivein, nasli jehdi mere'ch shae ve
Par, bas nai mainu mere te main ve
Duniya'ch das nahin bas ikko hi main ve
Mere, pichey pichey, zamana jali
Jinu dil tu dua do oh daye gali
Jinu andhere 'cho kad ke roshni dikhao
Ohi andhera dikhae tuhanu jado ohdi bari
Jinu tejori dikhao, ohi karey khali
Jehda phul todey baagh 'cho ohi baaney maali
Par, Raja saada befikar
Main kadi dil'ch duniya da rakheya nai dar
Ae duniya daur badaldey kardi ni daer
Har sher de haqq'ch sada rehndi nai savaer
Aaj raaj karan kal jiven aani nai vairi
Aaj kal vairi asli (zamana jali)

[Hook 2]
Ajj kal zamana jali, zamana jali, ajj kal zamana jali (x2)
Ajj kal de log jali, (zamana jali)
Matam de sog jali (zamana jali)
Ajj kal umeed jali, (zamana jali)
Ajj kal di preet jali (zamana jali)

[Verse: 2]
Ajj kal de vairiaan to daran main vi
Veri sarhkan te ni oh tech savvy
Excess'ch munde 24/7 gal ghatt karan text heavy
Pay back
Pindan vicho baithey-baithey online worldwide munde kissi nu vi karan hack
Sohni kuhdi jehdi sadaa milay online, on time, FaceTime mango kehndi next time
Naaley ajj kal airports te menu tang karan ve munde border patrol de
Mennu khalarke sawal men'tu puchan
Mere bag kholan meri jaibaan tatol de
Par, ajje vi main haske jawab dena
Smuggle karey hash jehda munda ohnu daad dena
Jinna de siran te appan kali raatan'ch phirde
Sooraj de charhde bi onha da hi sath dena
Aaj kal loki laban mere'ch kharabi
Mere jaman to pehlan to mera peyo si sharabi
Par, hun oh vi deke mainu maa di gali ve
Kehnday betay dhyaan nal challin zamana jali (zamana jali)

[Hook 2]
Ajj kal zamana jali, zamana jali, ajj kal zamana jali (x2)
Ajj kal de log jali, (zamana jali)
Matam de sog jali (zamana jali)
Ajj kal umeed jali, (zamana jali)
Ajj kal di preet jali (zamana jali)
